Christopher Mullins

I'll second that. I'm running Xampp on a Windows XP Pro workstation. Why...because I'm just a lowly contractor around here and they spend too much money on contractor's resources. But it runs fine and I've been testing the latest phpExcel with it using php 5.4.7. Works great so far, but the limits of access to the network drives is proving an obstacle...one that I don't worry about at all with .NET codes.
